email_chain.subject: Request for Quote - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 5,000 MT of steel coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles under CIF terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for this shipment? We are targeting a laycan of April 10-15.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER, DWT 60,000, LOA 200m, for your shipment. The initial freight quote is USD 45/MT CIF. The vessel is currently in Singapore and can be positioned to Shanghai by April 10.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate of USD 45/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider lowering it to USD 40/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

I understand your concern. The best I can do is USD 42/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours. Please let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.

Best regards,
Alex Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for the revised offer. We accept the rate of USD 42/MT. Please proceed with the booking and send us the necessary documentation.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Thank you for confirming. The booking is now secured. Please find attached the booking confirmation and the necessary documentation for your review. The laycan remains April 10-15, and the demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day.

Best regards,
Alex Lee
